segment.source: Configuring the Firewall for the App-V Servers
segment.target: Configuring the Firewall for the App-V Servers

segment.source: Configuring the Firewall for the App-V Servers
segment.target: Configuring the Firewall for the App-V Servers

segment.source: Configuring the Firewall for the App-V Servers
segment.target: Configuring the Firewall for the App-V Servers

segment.source: After you install the Microsoft Application Virtualization (App-V) Management Server or Streaming Server and configure it to use the RTSP or RTSPS protocol, you must create firewall exceptions for the App-V programs.
segment.target: After you install the Microsoft Application Virtualization (App-V) Management Server or Streaming Server and configure it to use the RTSP or RTSPS protocol, you must create firewall exceptions for the App-V programs.

segment.source: Configuring Firewall Exceptions for Application Virtualization Management Server
segment.target: Configuring Firewall Exceptions for Application Virtualization Management Server

segment.source: Create a firewall exception for sghwdsptr.exe and sghwsvr.exe.
segment.target: Create a firewall exception for sghwdsptr.exe and sghwsvr.exe.

segment.source: These programs are found in the folder C:Program FilesMicrosoft System Center App Virt Management ServerApp Virt Management Serverbin on a 32-bit operating system.
segment.target: These programs are found in the folder C:Program FilesMicrosoft System Center App Virt Management ServerApp Virt Management Serverbin on a 32-bit operating system.

segment.source: If you are using a 64-bit operating system version, the folder is located under C:Program Files (x86)Microsoft System Center App Virt Management ServerApp Virt Management Serverbin.
segment.target: If you are using a 64-bit operating system version, the folder is located under C:Program Files (x86)Microsoft System Center App Virt Management ServerApp Virt Management Serverbin.

segment.source: Configuring Firewall Exceptions for Application Virtualization Streaming Server
segment.target: Configuring Firewall Exceptions for Application Virtualization Streaming Server

segment.source: Create a firewall exception for sglwdsptr.exe and sglwsvr.exe.
segment.target: Create a firewall exception for sglwdsptr.exe and sglwsvr.exe.

segment.source: These programs are found in the folder C:Program FilesMicrosoft System Center App Virt Streaming ServerApp Virt Streaming Serverbin on a 32-bit operating system.
segment.target: These programs are found in the folder C:Program FilesMicrosoft System Center App Virt Streaming ServerApp Virt Streaming Serverbin on a 32-bit operating system.

segment.source: If you are using a 64-bit operating system version, the folder is located under C:Program Files (x86)Microsoft System Center App Virt Streaming ServerApp Virt Streaming Serverbin.
segment.target: If you are using a 64-bit operating system version, the folder is located under C:Program Files (x86)Microsoft System Center App Virt Streaming ServerApp Virt Streaming Serverbin.
